text: Deyakyy by skazaly, "Vony buly try; yikhniy sobaka yavlyayuchi soboyu chetverti," v toy chas, yak inshi by skazaly, "P'yatʹ; shostyy buduchy yikhnim sobakoyu," tomu shcho vony zdohadalysya. Inshi skazaly, "Sim," ta eighth yikhniy sobaka. Skazhitʹ, "Miy Lord yavlyayte soboyu krashchyy knower yikhnʹoho chysla." Tilʹky nechyslennyy znav pravylʹne chyslo. Tomu, ne sperechayutʹsya z nymy; tilʹky uz·hodzhuvatysya z nymy. Vy potrebuyete ne radyty budʹ khto pro tse
